FuncDef: This command shows all the information related to the base EVPN instance, including the base RD used for ES routes, the Ethernet-Segments or individual Ethernet-Segment information.
CLIs: bgp-evpn ethernet-segment name <name> [ all ] [ evi <evi> ] [ isid <isid> ]

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the name of an Ethernet segment for which to show information. 28 characters maximum.
Displays all available information for the specified Ethernet segment.
Displays information for the specified EVI. Values-1 to 65535.
Displays information for the specified ISID. Values-1 to 16777215.
